title: College Application Tips
author: Jane Doe
content: Here are some essential tips for writing a strong college application essay. Be authentic, proofread, and follow the guidelines.

comments.author: John Smith
comments.content: Great tips! I found the proofreading advice especially helpful.

title: Best Colleges for Computer Science
author: Michael Lee
content: If you're looking to major in computer science, here are the top colleges to consider. MIT, Stanford, and UC Berkeley lead the pack.

comments.author: Sara Khan
comments.content: Thanks for the info! Do you think smaller schools can compete with these big names?

comments.author: Emily White
comments.content: I went to UC Berkeley and had an amazing experience in their CS program.

title: How to Prepare for SATs
author: Rachel Green
content: The SAT can be challenging, but with the right preparation, you can excel. Here are some strategies to help you study effectively.

comments.author: David Johnson
comments.content: This was helpful! Do you recommend any specific study guides?
